sqlQueries.SqlQuery: SELECT Top 10 [structure_code] as primaryKey, [structure_name], [structure_code], [description], [last_updated_on], 'structure' as tableName FROM [ip].[structure]
SELECT Top 10 [planning_code] as primaryKey, [planning_Code], [short_name], [ppl_code] , [code22], 'planning_entity' as tableName FROM [ip].[planning_entity]
SELECT Top 10 dsc_code+anc_code as primaryKey, [dsc_code], [anc_code], [anc_depth], 'structure_tree' as tableName FROM [ip].[structure_tree]
